concept.title: Defining Stage Attributes
concept.shortdesc: You can use the Expression Evaluator processor to define stage attributes in the pipeline. Records without the expected header attributes are sent to the stage for error handling.

conbody.p:
To define a stage attribute in the Expression Evaluator, perform the following steps:
On the Expressions tab, specify the Header Attribute name.
To use a directory in the record header instead of a directory template, use the following header attribute name: targetDirectory.
For the Header Attribute Expression, define an expression that evaluates to the directory where the record should be written.
